resources.string: Mobile application developer: Anatoly Vinokurov. \n Sholom Aleichem University.
Choose an animal that runs faster.
"Congratulations! Level completed! \n Did you know that the Cheetah is the fastest predator? While running, it reaches speeds of up to 120 km/h"
"Level failed. \n You do not have enough stars to access the next level. Try to complete the level again"
Choose the animal that jumped higher.
"Congratulations! Level completed! \n Did you know that a dolphin can jump out of the water up to 3 meters high? It's on the second floor!"
Choose an animal whose tongue is longer.
"Congratulations! Level completed! \n Did you know that the giraffe needs such a long tongue to reach the branches with leaves located high on the tree"
